mapper.insert:
insert into BOARD(NUM, WRITER, TITLE, CONTENT, REGDATE, DEPTH, REF, PASSWORD) values (BOARD_SEQ.nextval, #{writer}, #{title}, #{content}, #{regdate}, #{depth}, BOARD_SEQ.currval, #{password})
select NVL(max(num),0) from BOARD
mapper.update: update BOARD set TITLE=#{title}, CONTENT=#{content}, MODDATE=#{moddate} where NUM=#{num}
mapper.delete: delete from BOARD where NUM=#{num} or REF=#{num}
mapper.select: select * from (select ROWNUM RNUM, NUM, WRITER, TITLE, CONTENT, READCOUNT, REGDATE, MODDATE, DEPTH, REF, PASSWORD from (select * from BOARD order by REF desc, DEPTH asc) where REF=NUM) where RNUM >= #{start} and RNUM <= #{end}

select * from (select ROWNUM RNUM, NUM, WRITER, TITLE, CONTENT, READCOUNT, REGDATE, MODDATE, DEPTH, REF, PASSWORD from (select * from BOARD order by REF desc, DEPTH asc) where ${type} LIKE '%'||#{str}||'%' and REF=NUM) where RNUM >= #{start} and RNUM <= #{end}
select * from BOARD where REF=#{num} and NUM!=#{num} order by DEPTH
mapper.update: update BOARD set READCOUNT=READCOUNT+1 where NUM=#{num}
mapper.select: select count(*) from BOARD where REF=NUM and ${type} LIKE '%'||#{str}||'%'

select.if: select max(NUM) from BOARD where NUM < #{num};
select min(NUM) from BOARD where NUM > #{num};
